name: Stellar 7
description:
Stellar 7 is a simulation game developed by Dynamix. It came out on 01-01-1990. Sierra On-Line published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Stellar 7 on PC.
Damon Slye produced the game. Alan McKean, Don Latarski, Kim Nagel and '''Mac:''' Kenneth Rogers scored the game.
